snippet.title: Carpe Diem Trailer
snippet.description:
In this very short kinetic novel, you will play as Jung who's meeting up and hanging out with a girl named Ai. Spend your time wisely.

What makes someone perfect? Experience this short bittersweet story in the shoes of the main character, Jung, where you will spend your time hanging out with a girl named Ai. Ai is everything Jung wishes for in a woman... except for one very important thing. A thing he prefers to disregard in order for them to have the best time of their lives.
You have a day to enjoy your date and see the world from Jung's point-of-view.

Release: 30th Nov 2015
Play on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/423880/Carpe_Diem/

TEAM:
Eyzi — Writer, Programmer
YayaChann — Sprite Artist
Playingmoon — Background Artist
BunnyHana, MilkTea — Asset Artists
CrysetBase — Composer

▬▬▬▬▬🌒▬▬▬▬▬
Moonlit Works is an indie developer and publisher of anime-influenced story-driven media such as games, novels, videos, and the like.

🌎 Website: https://moonlit.works
💎 Discord: https://discord.gg/moonlitworks
📢 Twitter: https://twitter.com/moonlitworks
💸 Patreon: https://patreon.com/moonlitworks
🎮 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/moonlitworks
📘 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/moonlitworks
